libxml2-python
==============

# Available modules


The overview below shows which libxml2-python installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using libxml2-python, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load libxml2-python/2.11.4-GCCcore-12.3.0
```
